  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/628</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/628</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Els dòlmens</string>
            <string language="en">Dolmens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dolmens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dolmens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dolmens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dolmens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Dolmens</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva per conèixer què eren els dòlmens i com es construïen. Conté un mapa interactiu amb la distribució dels dòlmens a Catalunya i algunes fotografies, a més d'activitats d'autoavaluació.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on what dolmens were and how they were built. It includes an interactive map showing where dolmens can be found in Catalonia, and photos; as well as self-assessment activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">jaciment arqueològic</string>
            <string language="en">archaeological site</string>
            <string language="es">yacimiento arqueológico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">prehistòria</string>
            <string language="en">prehistory</string>
            <string language="es">prehistoria</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf was dolmens waren und wie sie aufgebaut wurden. Er
enthält eine interaktive Karte Vertretung, in der dolmens in 
Katalonien gefunden werden können, und Fotos; sowie 
Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur
ce qu'étaient les dolmens et comment ils ont été établis. 
Elle inclut une apparence interactive de carte où des dolmens 
peuvent être trouvés en Catalogne, et des photos ; aussi bien 
que des activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em o que
os dolmens eram e como foram construídos. Inclui uma exibição
interativa do mapa onde os dolmens possam ser encontrados em 
Catalonia, e fotos; as.well.as atividades do self-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) su 
che cosa i dolmens erano e come sono stati sviluppati. Include 
una rappresentazione interattiva del programma dove i dolmens possono 
essere trovati in Catalogna e le foto; così come le attività 
di valutazione di se stesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) ποια 
dolmens ήταν και πώς χτίστηκαν. Περιλαμβάνει έναν 
διαλογικό χάρτη που εμφανίζει όπου dolmens μπορούν να βρεθούν
στην Καταλωνία, και τις φωτογραφίες  όπως και τις 
δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">archäologische Site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorgeschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">site archéologique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">préhistoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">local archaeological</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">prehistory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luogo archaeological</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prehistory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχαιολογική περιοχή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προϊστορία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
